entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baie-James
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:15 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
